other_title: The Idolmaster Cinderella Girls Second Season
アイドルマスター シンデレラガールズ 2ndシーズン
ending_theme: #1: "Yume-iro Harmony (夢色ハーモニー)" by CINDERELLA PROJECT (eps 1-3, 7-9)
#2: "Watashi-iro Gift (私色ギフト)" by Dekoration with Mika Jougasaki (Haruka Yoshimura) (ep 4)
#3: "Heart Voice" by CANDY ISLAND with Sachiko Koshimizu (Ayana Taketatsu) (ep 5)
#5: "Kokoro Moyou (心もよう)" by new generations (ep 10)
